Shivah:

Shivah took off in robot mode and shot two missiles one against 
DarkClaw and the other against DarkfWolf. He opened his comm 
links "Hey bros and sis, I need I litte help here..."

Alecto::

Alecto laughted while she destroyed Injector's missilesn "Good 
Fighter" commented the femme while she shot 2 missiles agains 
him "But my old Bro needs me... Who're you??? Rarely I saw good 
fighter like you..."

Kali/Dragonfly:

Kali and DragonFly avoided the shots, after that she landed and she 
was ready to fight against Dark One. 

When Scattershot mentioned "Alliance", Dragonfly tembled and 
said "Wait a nano Kali... I think that we have a little 
misunderstarding here..." and he spoke with Scattershot "So we have 
the honor to meet some Alliance's members"

"You have the honor.." Replied Kali

"What do you...?"

Kali left the place to help her brother Shivah.

"Great.." replied Dragonfly when he saw Scattershot flew without 
control towards CF's shields he quickly took off and flew behind... 
with the purpouse of avoid his crash against maximal's base.

DeepFear/Charon:

Charon avoided the shots and replied "Someone is going to die now... 
but I am not " and shoot 2 missiles agaisnt  Choran; Deepfear covered 
himself and after the Choran shots, he fired 25 times against him.

Darkfate:

Darkfate avoided the shots and fires 10 times agaisnt Choran and 15 
against Vehemet.

Manthys/Wespah/Atilla::

Manthys was hit by one of the disk and she began to fly outcontrol, 
Wespah and Attilla avoided the shots and fired 25 times (x bot). 
Atilla had recived Shivah's comm link but he didn't answer.
 

Luzbel:

Luzbel covered with his wings and them recived a slight damage, he 
laughted and attacked At Reflector with his sword of energon, with it 
he slashed Reflector's torso.
